title: Mushroom and Cheese Risotto
directions: Sauté diced shallots in a saucepan until translucent.
Add sliced mushrooms and cook until tender.
Stir in rice and cook for a minute.
Pour in wine and simmer until absorbed.
Gradually add vegetable broth, stirring occasionally, until rice is cooked al dente and creamy.
Remove from heat and stir in grated cheese until melted and creamy.
Serve hot and garnish with additional cheese and chopped parsley, if desired.

title: Garlic Butter Ribeye with Mashed Potatoes
directions: Preheat a cast iron skillet over high heat.
Season both sides of the ribeye steak with salt and black pepper.
Add butter to the hot skillet and sear the steak for about 2-3 minutes on each side, or until desired doneness.
Remove the steak from the skillet and let it rest for a few minutes.
In the meantime, boil the potatoes until tender.
Drain the potatoes and return them to the pot.
Add butter, minced garlic, salt, and milk to the potatoes.
Mash the potatoes until smooth and creamy.
Slice the ribeye steak and serve it with a dollop of garlic butter on top, alongside a generous scoop of mashed potatoes.

title: Garlic Butter Shrimp
directions: In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.
Add the minced garlic to the skillet and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Increase the heat to medium-high and add the shrimp to the skillet. Cook for 2-3 minutes on each side until they turn pink and opaque.
Remove the shrimp from the skillet and set aside.
Reduce the heat to low and add more butter if desired. Stir the melted butter and garlic together to create a creamy sauce.
Return the cooked shrimp to the skillet and toss them in the garlic butter sauce until evenly coated.
Cook for an additional minute to heat the shrimp through.
Serve the Garlic Butter Shrimp hot with a side of rice or crusty bread.
